short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save input text values for easy retrieval, eliminating rewriting. Quickly access and reuse saved values.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple yet powerful extension provides a fast and easy way to add values or save your inputs on any website or application for future use. When the extension is active and you one-click on an input field, or active autofil option, a popup menu appears with all the entries you have added before. This allows you to select and insert them into the text field quickly and in a simple way.

This extension is compatible with a wide range of websites and applications, and can be used with any input text field on your pc.

Typical scenarios where this extension can be useful include:

- Testing activities with large forms to fill
- Repetitive data that you need to reinsert
- Keeping data that you commonly use
- Save your inputs and save prompts to obtain more speed and productivity

With a single click, you can quickly select and input the value you need, whether it's numbers, letters, or pre-defined values. Plus, the extension is fully customizable with options to adjust the appearance and behavior to your liking. Try it out today and see how it can enhance your productivity!
